author: ezra
review:
This is the first time I ever wrote a review for anything.

For a $1 promo, this is the best deal you could ever get for a complete minifigure

Pros: only costs you a dollar
double sided torso printing
leg printing for pockets

cons: Tan hair doesn't match brown/dark tan hair in picture.
also, limited availability, good luck trying to snag one before greedy resellers buy up the whole stash.
